name: Sakura - Anime School Girl
description:
Sakura - Anime Girl is an awesome running game with cool manga anime graphics.

Sakura-chan is a cute anime girl who lives in Tokyo, Japan.
She was getting a shower after gym class, but someone got into the locker room and stole her things! How horrible! Sakura-chan needs to run home and needs to run fast.

Run though the streets of Tokyo and see how far can you go in this awesome running game. Help this cute anime girl get home safe!
Compete against your friends to be the best. Compete against the world in the global leaderboards. Endless running game is more fun than ever!

The streets of Tokyo are full of obstacles you should dodge. Run, jump, roll, dodge and jump again through all the cars, buses, barriers, barrels and keep running collecting all the gold coins.
Use powerups to cheat death. Use the coins to upgrade the powerups.

* Dash and dodge as fast as you can!
* Swipe to do lightning fast acrobatics!
* Online leaderboards and achievements!
* Awesome powerups!
* Collect coins to extend your powers!
* A cute anime girl!
* Anime girl moe voices! In Japanese! Kawaii!
* Infinite running game! And free!
* Endless run gameplay!

A universal free app with 3D HD optimized graphics.
